did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle: Office of Fraternity and Sorority Life, Office Administrative Files 1990-2005

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Use restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Office of Fraternity and Sorority Life, Office Administrative Files, Accession #18/2/15.071, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The files were transferred to the Library by the Office of Fraternity and Sorority Life, 2007 October 5.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of the Office of Fraternity and Sorority Life's administrative, alphabetical and topical files. Of interest is a scrapbook of clippings concerning Delta Upsilon and the Operation Equinox drug bust of 1991. The files also contain the University of Virginia Dr. Jerome H. Holland Medal awarded to Gilbert Jay Backers.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The files are arranged in seven series: Series I. Fraternal Organization Agreement Documentation; Series II. Sororities: Fraternal Organization Agreement Documentation; Series III. Multicultural Fraternities/Sororities: Fraternal Organization Agreement Documentation; Series IV. Fraternities: General Files; Series V. Sororities: General Files; Series VI. Multicultural Fraternities/Sororities-General Files; Series VII. Fraternity/Sorority Councils-General Files.

did.unittitle: Series I: Fraternal Organization Agreement (FOA) Documentation
Series II: Sororities - Fraternal Organization Agreement (FOA) Documentation
Series III: Multicultural Fraternities/Sororities- Fraternal Organization Agreement (FOA) Documentation
Alpha Kappa Delta Phi- FOA Documentation, 1999-2000
Chi Delta Sigma- General (Formerly Tau Epslion Phi), 1991-1992

scopecontent.p: Chiefly a scrapbook of 1991 clippings concerning a Drug Bust (copies).

did.unittitle: Series VII: Fraternity/Sorority Councils- General Files
Black Fraternal Council- Membership Intake Process, 1989-1999
University of Virginia Dr. Jerome H. Holland Medal awarded to Holland Scholar Gilbert Jay Backers, n.d.
